ygData.subject: Re: Magical Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: You want speed and delay you say? One word------- Bloodclaw. Nuff said. Loth/Rayne
ygData.messageBody:
You want speed and delay you say? One word------- Bloodclaw. Nuff said.


Loth/Rayne

> ----------
> From: Trent Carroll[SMTP:trent@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Thursday, June 24, 1999 2:23 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Magical Weapon
>
> From: "Trent Carroll" <trent@...>
>
> For my warrior I purchased some magical weapons. I purchased a Tentacle
> whip (4, 25) for 25 plat and a Dragoon Dirk (6,23) for 45 plat. The
> tentacle whip isn't all that great, but I've got it on my secondary hand,
> and occasionally it casts lifetap. I'd like something better that still
> has
> a fast delay and still does magic damage, but haven't found anything yet.
> There is a barbed leather whip that does (6,25) i think, but it sells for
> around 200 plat.
>
> Trent Carroll
> Programmer
> Houston Baptist University
> (281) 649-3410
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Patricia Halas [mailto:patty_halas@...]

> > have enough money to buy a combine longsword but it is getting so
> > boring. I
> > have nevered seen that named gnoll fellow even though I spend most of my
> > time hunting gnolls. At any rate, it there a better place for a level
> 17
> > Warrior to get herself a magic weapon then HH (or saving up plat for a
> > combine sword).
